title: History of Stock Splits and Corporate Actions for AMREP Corp

content.text: AMREP Corp completed a 2-for-1 stock split on February 9.
AMREP Corp completed a 2-for-1 stock split on December 14.
AMREP Corp completed a 1-for-3 reverse stock split on March 26.
AMREP Corp declared a special dividend of $6.00 per share on February 23.
AMREP Corp declared a special dividend of $1.00 per share on October 5.
AMREP Corp completed a 1-for-10 reverse stock split on January 15.
AMREP Corp declared a special dividend of $0.15 per share on February 21.
AMREP Corp declared a special dividend of $0.10 per share on December 4.

news.headline: AMREP Reports Second Quarter Fiscal 2024 Results
news.summary: HAVERTOWN, Pa., Dec. 11, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- AMREP Corporation (NYSE:AXR) today reported net income of $1,108,000, or $0.21 per diluted share, for its 2024 fiscal second quarter ended October 31, 2023 compared to net income of $3,621,000, or $0.68 per diluted share, for the same period of the prior year.
